subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|阜|alt1=阝|t1=hill, wall|夅|t2=descend|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – descending a hill.

subSections.title: Pronunciation 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=jiàng
|c=gong3
|h=pfs=kong/kiung
|h_note=kiung - only in the sense “to give birth”; kong - all other senses
|md=gáung
|mn=qz,tw,xm,zz:kàng
|mn-t=gang3
|w=2kaan
|mc=2
|oc=1,1
|cat=v,pn
